main.AboutMeSectionDescription: I empower companies through problem-solving and exceptional user experiences.

faqs.title: Do I get fully working website at the end?
faqs.description: As a UX/UI designer, I specialize in creating the visual design and user interface. While I focus on the design aspect, I collaborate with a skilled team of web developers who are responsible for bringing the design to life through development and coding.

faqs.title: How do you handle design revisions?
faqs.description: I value open communication and collaboration with clients. I take the time to understand your feedback and incorporate it into the design. I provide explanations of design choices, present alternative solutions when needed, and work closely with you to reach a design solution that meets your expectations.

faqs.title: Do you provide design documentation?
faqs.description: I provide design documentation and style guides to ensure ease of development and to facilitate understanding of the design.

faqs.title: How do you implement our brand identity?
faqs.description: I ensure your brand identity and message are effectively communicated through thoughtful design choices and brand-aligned visual elements.

faqs.title: Do you offer post-design support?
faqs.description: I offer post-design support during the implementation phase to address any design-related questions or concerns.

faqs.title: How do you take payment?
faqs.description: I take 50% upfront and the remaining 50% after the design is finalized. For clients in Russia, I accept any payment method. However, please note that I can only accept crypto-transactions from clients outside Russia as SWIFT transactions are blocked.

project-peek.description: Revolutionizing design and function, the project showcases a cutting-edge smart speaker concept. During this project I designed an adaptive website, 3D models and animations that transport users into an immersive visual realm.

project-ruble-brothers.description: Presenting a money exchange landing page design that is intuitive, user-friendly, and modern. Our design will make it easy for customers to quickly and securely exchange money.

project-yandex.description: Yandex Match is a new dating service that can help you find a person with similar hobbies thanks to the new feature — «Maximum Match»!
